text: Hi, is there a way to disable some of the default modules? Most of them my client will never use and they're only confusing to them.

It’s not currently possible to hide  HubSpot provided default modules. If you’re using a theme though you could suggest they only use theme modules. Theme modules are visually differentiated from modules not within the theme.
can child themes show different theme modules?
HubSpot doesn’t have any easy way to copy / paste content (and modules) from one drag-n-drop page to another, do they? Like WordPress has a `Copy all content` button.
